title: We'll restore a backup version and try updating..."
body:
Everyday now at least once or twice my game keeps restoring itself and then re patching. It is super annoying to deal with when it happens during a game.

Is this happening to anyone else right now???

replies.body: Thanks! seems to be working so far :)

That's happening one or twice in every match you play? Yikes I imagine that must be hella frustrating, but luckily I should be able to fix that up pretty easily for you. Look at the image below for the specific file to delete, and then make sure you run League from the other file mentioned. You may need to patch afterwards, but let me know if this doesn't help!

https://i.gyazo.com/1c522b921944a9fe635b802a925737bb.png
